name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ahoy for Chrome - Voice composer for Gmail

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voice reply for Email. Instantly capture and transcribe your voice into an email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send email with your Voice. Live, editable transcriptions + the recorded audio  captured instantly and ready to send.
